ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of August, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED to the following issue, rephrased for clarity:
Whether the Superior Court erred in reviewing, as a nonwaivable claim regarding legality of sentence, a claim that the trial court improperly imposed a sentence on felony-two aggravated assault when felony-one aggravated assault was charged in the criminal information.
